creator: julio.maranhao@gmail.com
text:
The example in the documentation refered has a space between > or < and the numbers.

RewriteEngine On
RewriteCond %{TIME_HOUR} > 20 [OR]
RewriteCond %{TIME_HOUR} < 07
RewriteRule ^/fridge - [F]

With the spaces, it does not work. Only the following sample works:

RewriteEngine On
RewriteCond %{TIME_HOUR} >20 [OR]
RewriteCond %{TIME_HOUR} <07
RewriteRule ^/fridge - [F]

Cheers.

creator: tony@pc-tony.com
text:
Patch committed.  Should be visible within the hour or so.

Cheers,
Tony
